title: Champion Reveal: Illaoi, the Hentai Queen revealed

embed.description: WIP] Following her debut in the Shadow and Fortune story , the champion reveal for ILLAOI, THE KRAKEN PRIESTESS, is out! http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/champion-reveal-illaoi-kraken-priestess Continue reading for more information! [Riot's page a little broke unfortunately! Filling in what we have!] Most champions arm themselves with swords or guns or magic or whatever, but Illaoi's bringing a freakin' god to the Rift.
